title: Without ninja, changing a .h files doesn't cause recompilation
body_html:
How to reproduce:

NO_CUDA=1 DEBUG=1 python setup.py build_deps develop
# change e.g. python_numbers.h to add a bunch of code with syntax errors
NO_CUDA=1 DEBUG=1 python setup.py build_deps develop # WORKS

installing ninja fixes this problem.
body_text:

body:
How to reproduce:
```
NO_CUDA=1 DEBUG=1 python setup.py build_deps develop
# change e.g. python_numbers.h to add a bunch of code with syntax errors
NO_CUDA=1 DEBUG=1 python setup.py build_deps develop # WORKS
```

installing ninja fixes this problem.
